name: A Second Before The War
description:
When people destroyed themselves in WWIII, new war was started by.. animals... Lead one of the five sides and save (or conquer - your choice) the world in this simple turn-based strategy.

What awaits you in this exciting game:


- 5 unique campaigns to unveil the potential of different sides

- Random event generation system - sabotage, fires, riots - can you handle them?

- A complex mechanism for calculating AI actions will not let even professionals get bored! Now the computer will be able to fight on a par with the pros!

- Weather conditions - the actions of each side are effective only in their own natural zone! How can polar bears conquer deserts, or salamanders conquer the North?

- Spy system - infiltrate your agent behind enemy lines and destroy his defenses from the inside!

ICE UNION
Lead an army of penguins and knock out everyone!

SAND ALLIANCE
Cunning varans and lizards have teamed up to extend their deserts! Become their leader!

ALLIANCE OF PEACE
Pandas never wanted the War - but world conditions decided otherwise! Save the world for the most peaceful side!

NORTHERN TRIO
The polar bears had to fight to survive... Enter the path of the strongest and show what you can do!

SOUTHERN BROTHERS
Greedy fire foxes are the most cruel and powerful in this war. Only united we can defeat them! Would you like to fight on their side?

====================================================================================

* Multiplayer will be added in case of the commercial success of the game. More info available in our social networks!!
